verses.verse: After <S%H310><s%> these things, <S%H1697><s%> when the wrath <S%H2534><s%> of King <S%H4428><s%> Ahasuerus <S%H325><s%> was pacified, <S%H7918><s%> he remembered <S%H2142><s%> Vashti, <S%H2060><s%> and what she had done, <S%H6213><s%> and what was decreed against her. <S%H1504><s%>

So it happened, <S%H4428><s%> when the king's commandment <S%H1697><s%> and his decree <S%H1697><s%> was heard, <S%H8085><s%> and when many <S%H7227><s%> maidens <S%H5291><s%> were gathered together <S%H6908><s%> to the citadel <S%H1002><s%> of Susa, <S%H7800><s%> to the custody <S%H3027><s%> of Hegai, <S%H1896><s%> that Esther <S%H635><s%> was taken <S%H3947><s%> into the king <S%H4428><s%>'s house, <S%H1004><s%> to the custody <S%H3027><s%> of Hegai, <S%H1896><s%> keeper <S%H8104><s%> of the women. <S%H802><s%>

The maiden <S%H5291><s%> pleased <S%H3190><s%> him, <S%H5375><s%> and she obtained kindness <S%H2617><s%> from him. <S%H6440><s%> He quickly <S%H926><s%> gave <S%H5414><s%> her cosmetics <S%H8562><s%> and her portions <S%H4490><s%> of food, <S%H7200><s%> and the seven <S%H7651><s%> choice maidens <S%H5291><s%> who were to be given <S%H5414><s%> her out of the king <S%H4428><s%>'s house. <S%H1004><s%> He moved <S%H8138><s%> her and her maidens <S%H5291><s%> to the best <S%H2896><s%> place in the women <S%H802><s%>'s house. <S%H1004><s%>

In the evening <S%H6153><s%> she went, <S%H935><s%> and on the next day <S%H1242><s%> she returned <S%H7725><s%> into the second <S%H8145><s%> women <S%H802><s%>'s house, <S%H1004><s%> to the custody <S%H3027><s%> of Shaashgaz, <S%H8190><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%>'s eunuch, <S%H5631><s%> who kept <S%H8104><s%> the concubines. <S%H6370><s%> She came in <S%H935><s%> to the king <S%H4428><s%> no more, <S%H4428><s%> unless the king delighted <S%H2654><s%> in her, <S%H7121><s%> and she was called by name. <S%H8034><s%>

So Esther <S%H635><s%> was taken <S%H3947><s%> to King <S%H4428><s%> Ahasuerus <S%H325><s%> into his royal <S%H4438><s%> house <S%H1004><s%> in the tenth <S%H6224><s%> month, <S%H2320><s%> which is the month <S%H2320><s%> Tebeth, <S%H2887><s%> in the seventh <S%H7651><s%> year <S%H8141><s%> of his reign. <S%H4438><s%>

The king <S%H4428><s%> loved <S%H157><s%> Esther <S%H635><s%> more than all the women, <S%H802><s%> and she obtained <S%H5375><s%> favor <S%H2580><s%> and kindness <S%H5375><s%> in his sight <S%H6440><s%> more than all the virgins; <S%H1330><s%> so that he set <S%H7760><s%> the royal <S%H4438><s%> crown <S%H3804><s%> on her head, <S%H7218><s%> and made her queen <S%H4427><s%> instead of Vashti. <S%H2060><s%>
